While concerning, there is no explicit mention or indication of self-harm, suicide, violence, abuse, or overdose. The individual is reaching out for support, which suggests a willingness to seek help rather than harm themselves.

title: User Story: Overdose
content: My friend almost didn't make it last night. Scariest thing I've ever been through. Please, if you're using, have someone with you and Narcan available. It can happen to anyone.
reason: The text describes a near-fatal event likely due to drug use (implied overdose) and strongly suggests a life-threatening situation. The reference to Narcan further supports this.
